SELECT t.tag_id , t.tag_name , count(ct.TAG_ID) as TagCount FROM tag t LEFT JOIN CONTENT_TAG ct ON t.TAG_ID = ct.TAG_ID WHERE t.is_deleted = 'N'
AND t.tag_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tagName}, '%')
GROUP BY t.tag_id, t.tag_name ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
SELECT ctt.TAG_ID , tg.TAG_NAME FROM CONTENT_TAG ctt JOIN TAG tg USING(TAG_ID) WHERE tg.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND ctt.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
